data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Kabardin-Balkar, Russia need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kabardin-Balkar, Russia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Kabardin-Balkar, Russia the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 13,588 believers living in Kabardin-Balkar, Russia.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Kabardin-Balkar access to a Bible in their own language.
Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Kabardin-Balkar, Russia.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Kabardin-Balkar with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kabardin-Balkar, Russia has a population of 928,500.

We estimate Kabardin-Balkar has 13,588 people who might know Jesus, 521,150 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 393,762 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Kabardin-Balkar, Russia to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 914,912 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood
